verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump Administration] [V: deserves] [ARG1: thanks and congratulations] [ARGM-CAU: for terminating American participation in the toothless Joint Comprehensive Plan Of Action , the ostentatiously official name of the Obama Administration 's " nuclear weapons deal " with Iran 's clerical dictatorship] .

The Trump Administration deserves thanks and congratulations for [V: terminating] [ARG1: American participation in the toothless Joint Comprehensive Plan Of Action , the ostentatiously official name of the Obama Administration 's " nuclear weapons deal " with Iran 's clerical dictatorship] .
